what: Price index data for the US economy
title: Price index data for the US economy
text: realtalk makes easy use common US price indexes R.

title: Price index data for the US economy
text: realtalk mostly data package includes several datasets common US price indexes, like CPI-U-RS: can see datasets available loading available_price_indexes: package_data_name column contains internal name dataset: can also use get_price_index():
code: library(realtalk) cpi_u_rs_annual #> # A tibble: 45 × 2 #>     year cpi_u_rs #>    <dbl>    <dbl> #>  1  1978     104. #>  2  1979     114. #>  3  1980     127. #>  4  1981     139. #>  5  1982     148. #>  6  1983     154. #>  7  1984     160. #>  8  1985     166. #>  9  1986     168. #> 10  1987     174. #> # ℹ 35 more rows available_price_indexes #> # A tibble: 13 × 6 #>    index_name         frequency seasonal min_date max_date package_data_name     #>    <chr>              <chr>     <chr>    <chr>    <chr>    <chr>                 #>  1 C-CPI-U            annual    <NA>     2000     2022     c_cpi_u_annual        #>  2 C-CPI-U            monthly   NSA      Dec 1999 May 2023 c_cpi_u_monthly_nsa   #>  3 CPI-U              annual    <NA>     1937     2022     cpi_u_annual          #>  4 CPI-U              monthly   NSA      Jan 1937 May 2023 cpi_u_monthly_nsa     #>  5 CPI-U              monthly   SA       Jan 1947 May 2023 cpi_u_monthly_sa      #>  6 CPI-U-RS           annual    <NA>     1978     2022     cpi_u_rs_annual       #>  7 CPI-U-RS           monthly   NSA      Dec 1977 Dec 2022 cpi_u_rs_monthly_nsa  #>  8 CPI-U-RS, extended annual    <NA>     1937     2022     cpi_u_rs_extended_an… #>  9 CPI-U-RS, extended monthly   NSA      Jan 1937 May 2023 cpi_u_rs_extended_mo… #> 10 CPI-U-X1           annual    <NA>     1967     1982     cpi_u_x1_annual       #> 11 CPI-U-X1           monthly   NSA      Jan 1967 Dec 1982 cpi_u_x1_monthly_nsa  #> 12 PCE                annual    <NA>     1929     2022     pce_annual            #> 13 PCE                monthly   SA       Jan 1959 Apr 2023 pce_monthly_sa pce_monthly_sa #> # A tibble: 772 × 3 #>     year month   pce #>    <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> #>  1  1959     1  16.0 #>  2  1959     2  16.1 #>  3  1959     3  16.1 #>  4  1959     4  16.1 #>  5  1959     5  16.1 #>  6  1959     6  16.2 #>  7  1959     7  16.2 #>  8  1959     8  16.2 #>  9  1959     9  16.3 #> 10  1959    10  16.3 #> # ℹ 762 more rows get_price_index("PCE", "monthly", "SA") #> # A tibble: 772 × 3 #>     year month   pce #>    <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> #>  1  1959     1  16.0 #>  2  1959     2  16.1 #>  3  1959     3  16.1 #>  4  1959     4  16.1 #>  5  1959     5  16.1 #>  6  1959     6  16.2 #>  7  1959     7  16.2 #>  8  1959     8  16.2 #>  9  1959     9  16.3 #> 10  1959    10  16.3 #> # ℹ 762 more rows

title: Price index data for the US economy

what: Price indexes available in the realtalk package — available_price_indexes
title: Price indexes available in the realtalk package — available_price_indexes
text: Price indexes available realtalk package

title: Price indexes available in the realtalk package — available_price_indexes
Price indexes available in the realtalk package — available_price_indexes
text: data frame available_price_indexes shows datasets available realtalk package. six columns: data_source Short price index name frequency time frequency data available) seasonal seasonally adjustment status data min_date first date availability max_date last date availability package_data_name internal data name series Use package_data_name value load specific series.

title: Price indexes available in the realtalk package — available_price_indexes
code: available_price_indexes #> # A tibble: 13 × 6 #>    index_name         frequency seasonal min_date max_date package_data_name     #>    <chr>              <chr>     <chr>    <chr>    <chr>    <chr>                 #>  1 C-CPI-U            annual    NA       2000     2022     c_cpi_u_annual        #>  2 C-CPI-U            monthly   NSA      Dec 1999 May 2023 c_cpi_u_monthly_nsa   #>  3 CPI-U              annual    NA       1937     2022     cpi_u_annual          #>  4 CPI-U              monthly   NSA      Jan 1937 May 2023 cpi_u_monthly_nsa     #>  5 CPI-U              monthly   SA       Jan 1947 May 2023 cpi_u_monthly_sa      #>  6 CPI-U-RS           annual    NA       1978     2022     cpi_u_rs_annual       #>  7 CPI-U-RS           monthly   NSA      Dec 1977 Dec 2022 cpi_u_rs_monthly_nsa  #>  8 CPI-U-RS, extended annual    NA       1937     2022     cpi_u_rs_extended_an… #>  9 CPI-U-RS, extended monthly   NSA      Jan 1937 May 2023 cpi_u_rs_extended_mo… #> 10 CPI-U-X1           annual    NA       1967     1982     cpi_u_x1_annual       #> 11 CPI-U-X1           monthly   NSA      Jan 1967 Dec 1982 cpi_u_x1_monthly_nsa  #> 12 PCE                annual    NA       1929     2022     pce_annual            #> 13 PCE                monthly   SA       Jan 1959 Apr 2023 pce_monthly_sa

what: Chained Consumer Price Index for Urban Consumers (C-CPI-U) data — c_cpi_u
title: Chained Consumer Price Index for Urban Consumers (C-CPI-U) data — c_cpi_u
text: Monthly annual C-CPI-U price indexes

title: Chained Consumer Price Index for Urban Consumers (C-CPI-U) data — c_cpi_u
Chained Consumer Price Index for Urban Consumers (C-CPI-U) data — c_cpi_u
text: data frame c_cpi_u_monthly_nsa contains -seasonally adjusted price index levels Chained CPI-U (C-CPI-U). three columns: year numeric year month numeric calendar month (1-12) c_cpi_u value C-CPI-U price index data frame c_cpi_u_annual contains annual price index level Chained CPI-U (C-CPI-U). two columns: year numeric year c_cpi_u value C-CPI-U price index

title: Chained Consumer Price Index for Urban Consumers (C-CPI-U) data — c_cpi_u
text: https://www.bls.gov/cpi/

what: Consumer Price Index for Urban Consumers (CPI-U) data — cpi_u
title: Consumer Price Index for Urban Consumers (CPI-U) data — cpi_u
text: Monthly annual CPI-U price indexes

title: Consumer Price Index for Urban Consumers (CPI-U) data — cpi_u
Consumer Price Index for Urban Consumers (CPI-U) data — cpi_u
text: data frames cpi_u_monthly_sa cpi_u_monthly_nsa contain, respectively, seasonally adjusted seasonally adjusted monthly price index levels CPI-U. three columns: year numeric year month numeric calendar month (1-12) cpi_u value CPI-U price index data frame cpi_u_annual contains annual price index level CPI-U. two columns: year numeric year cpi_u value CPI-U price index

title: Consumer Price Index for Urban Consumers (CPI-U) data — cpi_u
text: https://www.bls.gov/cpi/

title: Consumer Price Index for Urban Consumers (CPI-U) data — cpi_u

what: Consumer Price Index for Urban Consumers Research Series (CPI-U-RS) data — cpi_u_rs
title: Consumer Price Index for Urban Consumers Research Series (CPI-U-RS) data — cpi_u_rs
text: Monthly annual CPI-U-RS price indexes

title: Consumer Price Index for Urban Consumers Research Series (CPI-U-RS) data — cpi_u_rs
Consumer Price Index for Urban Consumers Research Series (CPI-U-RS) data — cpi_u_rs
text: data frame cpi_u_rs_monthly_nsa contains seasonally adjusted monthly price index levels CPI-U-RS (CPI-U research series). CPI-U-RS consistent time CPI-U incorporates recent improvements CPI-U entire time series. three columns: year numeric year month numeric calendar month (1-12) cpi_u_rs value CPI-U-RS price index data frame cpi_u_rs_annual contains annual price index level CPI-U-RS. two columns: year numeric year cpi_u_rs value CPI-U-RS price index

title: Consumer Price Index for Urban Consumers Research Series (CPI-U-RS) data — cpi_u_rs
text: https://www.bls.gov/cpi/research-series/r-cpi-u-rs-home.htm

title: Consumer Price Index for Urban Consumers Research Series (CPI-U-RS) data — cpi_u_rs
Extended CPI-U-RS price index — cpi_u_rs_extended
text: monthly annual CPI-U-RS series extended 1937 present, based CPI-U-RS, CPI-U, CPI-U-X1.

title: Extended CPI-U-RS price index — cpi_u_rs_extended
Extended CPI-U-RS price index — cpi_u_rs_extended
text: extended CPI-U-RS series uses 1978-2022 CPI-U-RS extends retroactively chaining CPI-U-RS (1978-2022), CPI-U-X1 (1967-1977), CPI-U (1966 , 2023 present). data frame cpi_u_rs_extended_monthly_nsa contains non-seasonally adjusted price index levels extended CPI-U-RS. three columns: year numeric year month numeric calendar month (1-12) pce value CPI-U-RS extended price index data frame cpi_u_rs_extended annual contains annual price index level extended CPI-U-RS. two columns: year numeric year pce value PCE price index

title: Extended CPI-U-RS price index — cpi_u_rs_extended
text: U.S. Census Bureau also uses similar combination price indexes extend CPI-U-RS: https://www.census.gov/topics/income-poverty/income/guidance/current-vs-constant-dollars.html.

title: Extended CPI-U-RS price index — cpi_u_rs_extended

what: Experimental Consumer Price Index for Urban Consumers X1 (CPI-U-X1) data — cpi_u_x1
title: Experimental Consumer Price Index for Urban Consumers X1 (CPI-U-X1) data — cpi_u_x1
text: Monthly annual CPI-U-X1 price indexes

title: Experimental Consumer Price Index for Urban Consumers X1 (CPI-U-X1) data — cpi_u_x1
Experimental Consumer Price Index for Urban Consumers X1 (CPI-U-X1) data — cpi_u_x1
text: data frame cpi_u_x1_monthly_nsa contains seasonally adjusted monthly price index levels CPI-U-X1 January 1967 December 1982. three columns: year numeric year month numeric calendar month (1-12) cpi_u_x1 value CPI-U-X1 price index data frame cpi_u_x1_annual contains annual average price index level CPI-U-X1. two columns: year numeric year cpi_u_x1 value CPI-U-X1 price index
